about.title: About
about.subtitle: The importance of Khorezm national games
about.content: Khorezm national games are an important part of ancient traditions and cultural heritage. They have been passed down through generations and remain significant today.

contact.description: Have questions or want to learn more about our traditional games? Reach out to us through any of these channels.
